title: Ep 139 | Jep's Bizarre Run-In with the HOA, Phil Is 911, and Jase's Problem with Tree-Hugging
description:
Jep discovers that his trampoline runs afoul of HOA rules, and Phil, Jase, and Zach find it absolutely absurd. Zach's wife triggers the mask police on her own front porch. Phil reveals why he's 911 for the local rednecks and shares the story of the land he gave away to Burly. Jase takes issue with tree-hugging and highlights an uncomfortable verse in John 12. And the guys discuss what a healthy constitutional republic means to the kingdom of God and how to experience the kingdom now.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
